not_found.title: Page not found
not_found.description: This page does not exist or is no longer available.
not_found.error: I couldn't find the page you were looking for, but you can always try to go back with this magic button!
not_found.returning: Well, I knew that wouldn't work, but at least you tried...

error.message: An error occurred while loading resources.
error.description: Unable to download the necessary resources. Make sure you have internet access with a stable connection.

intro.2: Discover me through a live session!
intro.3: But you are the one who runs it!

error.length: The username must be between 3 and 20 characters.
error.invalid: The username can only contain the following special characters . ° é è É È -

success.2: , your live has started. Don't forget to check your to-do list!

settings.title: Settings
settings.show_skills: Show skills related to my degree

message.1: Not bad for a first try... but we can do better, right?
message.2: Restart? Are you testing the limits of the game or the developer?
message.3: I've seen longer lives but rarely as stylish.
message.4: Rebooting the live in a few seconds...
message.5: You're lucky, I'm in a good mood today!

message.1: I'm sad to see you go. Click again to confirm you really want to leave the live.
message.2: You must have missed the button! Try again carefully.
message.3: Are you sure you understood where to click?
message.4: You don't seem to want to leave, you're missing the target!
message.5: What patience! This is your 5th click...
message.6: I didn't think it would be this hard for you!
message.8: What keeps you here? The button is right there!
message.9: You can leave the live at any time. It's a free country after all!
message.10: In the end, why leave? We're good here, aren't we?
message.11: You've clicked 11 times, looks like you're having more fun than expected!
message.12: This is getting ridiculous... The more you click, the more you embarrass yourself!
message.13: 13 failed attempts, you're breaking records for tenacity!
message.14: Ok, you win, I'm removing it! Now figure out how to leave!

message.multiple: You're back, you were gone for more than 5 minutes! You lost a lot of viewers!
message.unique: You're back, you were gone for more than 5 minutes! You lost your only viewer!
message.long: One of your viewers complained about inactivity for over an hour! Unfortunately, we have to cut your live.

settings_show_skills_first_click.title: Enable the not-so-great option
settings_show_skills_first_click.description: Great, among all the cool options, you chose this one! Go back to a project to see the change.

settings_switch_to_english.title: Mister Worldwide
settings_switch_to_english.description: Yes of course, I can speak English! But why would you want to do that? French is so much better!

settings_try_to_quit.title: The Stubborn
settings_try_to_quit.description: You tried to quit the live, but you didn't succeed. You can be proud of yourself!

donations_50_euros.title: The beginning of wealth
donations_50_euros.description: You've already accumulated 50 euros in donations, that's a good start!

donations_100_euros.title: The future millionaire
donations_100_euros.description: You've reached 100 euros in donations, you can enjoy buying a cheap pack of cigarettes!

donations_200_euros.title: The millionaire
donations_200_euros.description: You've reached 200 euros in donations, you're now rich! Time for a luxury pack of cigarettes!

donations_500_euros.title: The serial millionaire
donations_500_euros.description: You've reached 500 euros in donations, what could be better than a luxury pack and a used car at the same price!

projects_all_opened.title: The Interested
projects_all_opened.description: You've opened all the projects, blink if you're a real fan!

not_found.title: I'm different
not_found.description: You found a page that doesn't exist, congratulations! Know that you're the first to do so!

time_played_2_minutes.title: 2 minutes of pleasure
time_played_2_minutes.description: You've already lost 2 minutes of your life, and that's worth celebrating!

time_played_5_minutes.title: 5 minutes of happiness
time_played_5_minutes.description: 5 minutes looking at my work, that warms my heart.

time_played_10_minutes.title: 10 minutes of madness
time_played_10_minutes.description: How do you last so long? Tell me your secret!

time_played_20_minutes.title: 20 minutes of passion
time_played_20_minutes.description: I'm sure you're staying of your own free will and not because you're stuck!

time_played_30_minutes.title: 30 minutes of magic
time_played_30_minutes.description: I'm going to invite you to turn off your screen and go out to get some sun.

time_played_45_minutes.title: 45 minutes of addiction
time_played_45_minutes.description: At this point, you're probably addicted to my work, you always need your dose now!

time_played_1_hour.title: 1 hour of overdose
time_played_1_hour.description: I'll pretend I'm not watching the time spent, I don't want to get in trouble...

projects.description:
Web platform for the company **Level Plus** (connecting companies and seniors seeking jobs in Geneva) designed during my apprenticeship at Makeprops ❤.

The application allows talents to complete a profile, participate in events, and get support in their job search. There is also a backoffice for administration, managers, and contributors with a **&permission management** system, templates, and **&automatic email sending.**

projects.description:
Showcase site for my school, the MMI department of **IUT de Chambéry**. The site presents the courses, some student projects, and was completed in 2 weeks. It is built on Wordpress with a **&custom theme** and the **&ACF** plugin for content management.

Designed as an interface simulating a computer, the site includes movable windows and icons. Each window is an ACF block, making the whole thing fully manageable.

projects.description:
Command-line tool developed for the company **Makeprops** during my apprenticeship. It allows generating project templates to facilitate the creation of new projects (**makeprops templates create**).

This internal project is published as a **&private npm package**. It is developed in **&Object-Oriented Programming** and is designed to be modular and extensible. It also comes with documentation.

projects.description:
**&Private streaming server** for my grandfather, allowing him to access his personal collection of movies purchased over the years.

The infrastructure is secured via **&strict network rules** (whitelist, additional authentication, wireguard tunnel) and custom configuration. The app was customized for ease of use, and files are automatically compressed via **&scripts** to optimize performance.

projects.description:
Piège à moustiques connecté, développé dans le cadre d'un projet étudiant. Il permet de capturer les moustiques et de les compter via une application web. 

Le projet comprend un dispositif physique avec un **&microcontrôleur** et de multiples capteurs (fourche optique, température, CO2...) ainsi qu'une application web pour visualiser les données et les statistiques de capture. Le tout est conçu pour être accessible et facile à utiliser. Il communique via **&MQTT sur le réseau LoraWAN**.
